citations.narrative:
The registrant did not report that a new site is conducting regulated activity on a regulated species within 10 days of
making such change. The registrant told APHIS inspectors at the beginning of the inspection that this new site began
conducting regulated activity earlier this fiscal year. The site is located approximately 42 miles from the registered site.
Previously, this site did not conduct regulated activity. Failure to provide notification of new sites could interfere with
APHIS officials’ ability to inspect all animals that are impacted by regulated activity.
The research facility must notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other
change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such change. Correct by
sending official notification via mail or email to register the new site. Correct by 11-AUG-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.30(c) 
   
Registration. 
The registrant did not report that a new site is conducting regulated activity on a regulated species within 10 days of 
making such change. The registrant told APHIS inspectors at the beginning of the inspection that this new site began 
conducting regulated activity earlier this fiscal year. The site is located approximately 42 miles from the registered site. 
Previously, this site did not conduct regulated activity. Failure to provide notification of new sites could interfere with 
APHIS officials’ ability to inspect all animals that are impacted by regulated activity. 
 
The research facility must notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other 
change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such change. Correct by 
sending official notification via mail or email to register the new site. Correct by 11-AUG-2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
